alert.note: Alert for Adams; Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 11:48PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Adams and northeastern Kearney Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1148 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Heartwell, or 16 miles southeast of Kearney, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Norman around 1155 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Holstein and Roseland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
